title: Mediterranean Tahini Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup water, or more as needed
2 teaspoons minced garlic, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Combine water, yogurt, tahini, lemon juice, olive oil, parsley, garlic, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl; whisk until sauce is a little runny but still coats a spoon.
